docs.snippet: LONDON, Oct. 15--The British cruiser Ajax, which participated in the battle of the Plate off Uruguay last December that ended with the scuttling of the German pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee, sank three Italian destroyers eighty miles off...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 15--The British cruiser Ajax, which participated in the battle of the Plate off Uruguay last December that ended with the scuttling of the German pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee, sank three Italian destroyers eighty miles off Southeast Italy last Saturday, an Admiralty communique announced today.
docs.abstract: Brit cruiser Ajax sinks 3 Ital destroyers off Southeast Italy
